abstract: A private equity fund of Goldman Sachs has added another hedge fund investment to its portfolio, Dow Jones reported, marking the third stakebuilding in a hedge fund firm this week by a bank or asset manager.
lead_paragraph: A private equity fund of Goldman Sachs has added another hedge fund investment to its portfolio, Dow Jones reported, marking the third stakebuilding in a hedge fund firm this week by a bank or asset manager.

headline.main: Goldman Sachs Said to Take Stake In Claren Road
